Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Joseph DelGiorno's eligibility to apply for a military service credit
Summary: Authorizes Joseph DelGiorno's eligibility to apply for a military service credit for his service in the Korean conflict.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Joseph DelGiorno's eligibility to apply for military service credit in the New York state teachers' retirement system
